categories: Category:Articles with elements from unlicensed sources

nodes.text: The Varada sector was a sector located within the Outer Rim Territories. It contained the Bestal and Varada systems. It was located near the Tunka sector. The Varada sector contained the Dentamma Nebula.
SoroSuub Corporation owned the entire sector apart from the planet Bestal Three and the Kadal Asteroid Field, which were owned by Fax Ventures.
